part.Name: UD_DoNotPetMe
part.WarnMessage: Consider yourself warned, =Name=, I will not suffer you trying that again.
part.AngerMessage: {{W|I WARNED YOU NOT TO PET ME AGAIN!}}

tag.Name: PetResponse
tag.Value: =subject.T= =verb:cope=\u002C =pronouns.subjective= =verb:seethe=. =pronouns.Subjective= malds, even.,=subject.T= =verb:seethe= silently.,=subject.T= =verb:croak= indignantly.,=subject.T= =verb:stare= at =object.t= with bewildered contempt.
